reviewText:
I've bought many highlight DVDs from NFL films and rarely has it lived up to my expectations.  This is without a doubt the best NFL highlight DVD I've ever bought.  Each section deals with a different subject.  My personal favorite is "Intimidators" which deals with the meanest, baddest, hardest hitting players of all time making some of the meanest, baddest, hardest hits of all time.  For a real treat watch Bednarik take Gifford's head off in slow mo.

As a BALTIMORE Colt fan it was great to see the bits on Mackey, Moore, Unitas, etc.  The clip of Mackey running over 10 guys on the way to the end zone is included here and I've only seen that on 1 other DVD.  The clips of Sayers are priceless but all the great running backs are here.  There's also a great part where they ask players to name the best play of their careers and then show those plays in slow mo.  If there is an NFL films worthy of 5 stars this is it.

I never get tired of watching Football, I can watch it alll the time. this collection is a Historic take through Some  of the Greatest Players&Coaches who have made the game incredible. this collection breaks down Players into various categorys. it is a Must have.
Our son loves the CD
great look back into the early days of pro football.
Awesome DVD. Must have for die hard football fans

When I want to watch football, I have 3 or 4 of these historic football videos to watch.  These are from an era where they allowed them to play real football.....not this watered down version that they play today.

I enjoyed this video, although I wish the NFL would make a "real time" highlight video. I get tired of seeing all the highlights in slow motion but this was good regardless.
My husband's been watching football for 50 years and he thought this was the most comprehisively & well told dvd he's seen
A rapid sending and the movie is a compilation of the most valuable players and coaches  of the NFL .Recomendable
I ordered this for my dad who is the ultimate football fan. He loves this and reviews it with friends and by himself, and he shares it too.
Nothing new here. Have viewed more comprehensive material over the years but for $5.00 why not add it to your film library.
This was bought for my 13 year old nephew that is obsessed with watching this type of thing. He absolutely loves it.
DVD is OK.  The material is a little dated with older players and coaches.  For the price, I am satisfied.
He falls asleep at night watching this cause he can't get enough of football.... not because it puts him to sleep.
My son lives and breathes football, this is one of his gifts. He has yet to open it but I'm sure he will love it as long as it works.

i read the other reviews before i purchased this, and i was not disappointed! i can say i actually learned something from this video! All i wanted was to be entertained and i got that and more! oh yea, sorry got off track, if you like football no matter which team you root for, just get this.
Great gift for my brother who's a sports fanatic!  Thanks for helping me make his birthday very special.  Great product.

My grandson is an avid football fan and I wanted to acquaint him with some of the history of the game and those players and coaches who made the game what it is today.  I got this for him as a gift and my daughter says between this and his Madden Game she can barely tear him away to do his homework.
My 15 year old son loved this video! He's watched it twice since we received it.  His dad is really glad he bought it too!
This was a Christmas present for my husband and he said he really liked it and that it had some of his favorite coaches/players in it!

There are a bunch of DVDs out there that any football fan would really enjoy. This is another one in that line. From the Intimidators to the Pioneers of the game, every football fan in your house will enjoy something this DVD has to offer!
Bought this for Christmas for my 8 year old.  He loves it.  Actually we all love it.  I really liked seeing all of the old players and their awesome plays.

Nostalgic journey back down football's GOLDEN past! With few exceptions, it reminds what was good about football at its' best. As ever, NFL Films is the peerless "scribe" stunningly recording most of football's uniquely enthralling moments.

It was produced in 2006, this should have been in HD. It's probably worth $5 I paid, but I should have read more closely that it's just in 4:3 aspect. It's like watching the NFL on an old recorded VHS.
Purchased this movie, because my niece and nephews are huge football fans. It did not disappoint

The DVD was very interesting, but is missing some key players and information.  Also, I expected a bonus feature or something where you could examine statistics and player bios.  That was not present.

However, if you are looking to start an NFL Films collection you should certainly get this DVD.  Only steer clear if you have multiple others as it will be a repeat of a lot of information/highlights

Even though I bought this item a few months back it is still a nice, inspirational and motivational DVD to watch. I am so happy that they showed Barry Sanders who was my inspiration as a teenager. And how can anyone forget that graceful catch by Lynn Swann. This DVD brings you in categories of hall of famers from the past and the players who would be inducted in the future. Although I enjoyed the Greatest Superbowl DVD a little more, this DVD is a must for all NFL fans. The only disappointment some people may have is not seeing current stars like Peyton Manning and Tom Brady on this DVD.

all here - wow- Namath, Unitas, jim brown, al davis, madden, shula, perfect season of dolphins, earl campbell, dorsett, montana, geo allen, sayers, and on and on.
buy it - great for a pre-game party video.

For fans of the current National Football League, which is now far and away the most popular professional sporting league in American history, it is often difficult to imagine a time when not every game (or any game) was on TV, and not every second was scrutinized by round-the-clock media coverage.  This DVD takes fans back to a simpler time and gives a nice little history lesson on some of the players, coaches, and personalities that paved the way for the success the league enjoys today.

Though technically out to document the "greatest NFL players and coaches", this DVD in all actuality focuses primarily on players from the 1950s, 60s, and 70s (or even earlier) and gives them their "fair due" in an age when fans often times don't care about the rich history of the game.  Though I knew most of the names, it was still interesting to put a face to them, see them in action and hear their thoughts about playing the game they loved.  Names like Red Grange, Jim Brown, Otto Graham, and Gale Sayers may not resonate with young fans, but this program shows how truly important they were in terms of popularizing televised football.

Usually, it is only baseball that gets a good reputation for having a rich, vibrant history dating back many, many years, but this show proves that football has an interesting past of its own.  Thus, I would recommend this DVD to any football-lovers out there.  Older fans will become awash in nostalgia, while younger viewers will be treated to a history lesson about the game they currently obsess over.
This is a solid DVD that has a lot of great footage and includes most of the games greatest players. I would highly recommend this to give as a gift!

This is a wonderfull compilation of some of the most memorable moments in the history of the NFL. Lot's of great NFL footage, an absolute joy to watch. The best historical video of the NFL you can get.

I purchased this video for my 11 year old son who is totally obsessed with football. He absolutely loves it. He was introduced to some veteran NFL players and coaches and he got a big kick out of seeing how far football has evolved over the years. This is a must have for any football fan!
Most of these turn out to be disappointing but not so with this one. It was done very well and will not let you down. Buy it, you will be glad you did. Buy two, give one to a friend.

Wow.  If you like football and want to learn a lot, get this DVD.  It is long and will provide you with a great education on the early days of the NFL.  Most of the players and coaches I either saw or knew of; some I had never heard of.  The old films were neat and added a lot.  This is a must for true diehard NFL fans.  Watch this with your Dad and Granddad; they'll probably have some stories to add in.
Awesome video. Great historical peeks at many of the greats. A must have for any football fan.
This is a great disk for watching during the offseason with your father and your son to talk about your favorites.

I haven't watched it yet but I will watch it with him whenever I get a chance. I know that this will be a DVD that he will watch many times.
